### reponsive image map 예제
```html
<!-- html -->
<body>
  <div class="container">
    <div class="main">
      <!-- Image Map Generated by http://www.image-map.net/ -->
      <img
        src="/img/이미지주소"
        usemap="#event_img"
      />
      <map name="event_img" id="event_img">
        <area
          target="_blank"
          alt="submit"
          title="submit"
          href="링크주소"
          coords="좌표(x1,y1,x2,y2)"
          shape="rect"
        />
      </map>
    </div>
  </div>
</body>
```

```css
/* css */
.main {
        max-width: 1200px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        position: relative;
      }

      img[usemap] {
        max-width: 100%;
        margin: 0 auto;
        border: none;
        height: auto;
        width: auto;
      }
```

```javascript
  <script src="js/jquery-1.8.1.min.js"></script>
  /* responsive image maps */
  <script src="js/jquery.rwdImageMaps.js"></script>

  //적용
  <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function (e) {
    $('img[usemap]').rwdImageMaps();
    });
  </script>
```
